name: 人文領域專業學術英文寫作與口語表達技巧
description: The primary goal of this class is to enhance students’ development of the academic writing, research methods, and presentation skills in humanity disciplines. Students will develop the English reading and writing skills necessary to comprehend and produce journal articles or theses/dissertations in their specialized field. Students will also discuss and develop the skills they will need to present their research in a seminar or at an international conference.
goals: To develop academic writing skills for humanity disciplines
To learn to make use of databases for research in humanity sciences
To develop oral presentation skills in academic contexts
